item.description:
The Providence Rotary is hosting their 11th Annual Street Painting Festival a the BoA Skating center, live music and food in adjacent Burnside Park. Hang out, eat festival food and listen to music in the park. I guess this will have to fill my Octoberfest craving...8)

after a couple of hours (the artists start at 10), we should be able to make out the designs and participate in the judging.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a meetup sig, I'll be at the railing above the north end of the skating center (street level), carrying a bike helmet.
item.name: Providence Street "Painting" Festival
